description:
Kangaroo is a SQL client and admin tool.

Kangaroo is a AI-powered SQL client and admin tool for popular databases(MariaDB / MySQL / Oracle / PostgreSQL / SQLite / SQLServer / ...) on Windows / MacOS / Linux, support table design, query, model, sync, export/import etc, focus on comfortable, fun and developer friendly.
New features & bug-fixes
- Integrate database branch with AI feature
- Oracle: add sql view support
- Oracle: add materialized view support
- Oracle: add function support
- Oracle: add procedure support
- Oracle: add user support
- Oracle: add role support
- Oracle: 11g above version compatibility support
- Update app status page information
- Improve the recent list logic to avoid adding the same object multiple times
- Windows installer add VCRedist check and install support
- Update pre-defined shortcuts
- Update Chinese translation(zh-CN/zh-SG/zh-Hans/zh-Hant)
- Fixed: code editor crash issue
- Fixed: drag workspace tab crash issue
- Fixed: UI layout issue(Import from libadwaita)
- Fixed: Code editor dark theme support
